participant_1.background:
I met my family through adoption, and I am so grateful to have them in my life.
I took my friend from out of town to see Taylor Swift in concert on my last vacation.
I run for my mom.
i like to recycle my thrift shop finds and make new items.
I tore my ACL while racing go carts and couldn't race for the rest of the season.

participant_2.background:
I am an actor, but I am currently on a break from working and am enjoying my time with my family in a small mountain town.
Toronto summers are crazy but I manage to stay sane with the help of my black lab.
my major was american literature and education.
i love going to comedy clubs.
I'm a clumsy artist who is trying to find my way in the world.

content.text: I'm a clumsy artist who is trying to find my way in the world.
I'm an actor, but I am currently on a break from working and am enjoying my time with my family in a small mountain town.
That sounds lovely! I'm glad you're getting some time to relax.
Thank you, it's been very much needed. I've been keeping busy with my black lab and going to comedy clubs.
I love going to comedy clubs! Who are your favorite comedians?
I love John Mulaney and Chris Rock. What about you?
I love John Mulaney too! I also like Bill Burr and Dave Chappelle.
Those are all great comedians! I've seen them all live.
Me too! They're all so funny live.
I'm glad you're enjoying your time off.
Thank you, I am. I'm looking forward to getting back to work soon, but I'm also enjoying this break.
I'm sure you'll be great when you get back to work.
Thank you! I'm looking forward to it.
